definitions.definition: Something which hinders : something that holds back or causes problems with something else.
examples: High-heeled shoes may be fashionable, but they can also be a hindrance to walking.

definitions.definition: The state or act of hindering something.
examples: Your hindrance of this process will not be tolerated.

main_definition: Something which hinders : something that holds back or causes problems with something else.
secondary_definitions: The state or act of hindering something.
